name: 2024 9th International Conference on Biomedical Signal and Image Processing
content: Publication and Indexï¼š International Conference Proceedings by ACM (ISBN: 979-8-4007-1797-0), which will be archived in ACM Digital Library, indexed by Ei Compendex and Scopus, and submitted to be reviewed by Thomson Reuters Conference Proceedings Citation Index (ISI Web of Science). Or Journal of Image and Graphics (JOIG, ISSN: 2301-3699), which will be included in Scopus, Google Scholar, Crossref, CNKI, etc.
